items.name: German Pilsner
items.desc:
6 cans of German Pilsner.
A simple, dry, clean and clear refresher made with 100% German Pilsen malt and heaps of Hallertau Mittlefrüh hops.
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.

All 440ml Cans
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.

items.name: Neal Gets Things Done IPA
items.desc:
6 cans of Neal Gets Things Done IPA
Off the canning line, into the fridges, and drinking like a dream, Neal’s back getting things done. Sit back, relax and enjoy this flavour-packed ride of Simcoe, Citra, Mosaic & Nelson Sauvin - a magic trip awaits.
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.

items.name: Tomorrow Is Pale Ale
items.desc:
6 cans of Tomorrow Is Pale Ale.
The first of our Cornish Creatives collaborations, ‘Tomorrow Is’ is a 5.2% pale hopped with Loral and Cashmere. A refreshing departure from commonly used hop varieties that boasts an abundance of floral and citrus notes. Featuring artwork from illustrator and longtime friend of Verdant, Nick Radford.
Possible delivery delays of up to 7 working days - 24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.

items.name: Watt Moon IPA
items.desc:
6 cans of 20 Watt Moon IPA.
A Strata-packed IPA backed up with a hefty dose of Citra! Dank pine needles on the nose, alongside clean grapefruit and tropical fruit flavours.
Possible delivery delays of up to 7 working days - 24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
